title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Utilizing IMS Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of instructional design fundamentals and experience in language education
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Evaluating the ability to design activity flows using core components of IMS LD (Levels A-B).

Learners identify five or more real-world barriers (e.g., accessibility, technical proficiency, time constraints) occurring when using paper-based (worksheets, evaluation forms) and digital tools (Google Docs, LMS) in public/nonprofit educational institutions, and provide at least one specific case for each barrier
Convert mobile-optimized language learning scenarios into IMS LD format

Learners select four or more developer tools (Git, GitHub, VS Code, IntelliJ), compare at least three advantages/disadvantages of each, and write suitability evaluation reports based on project types (web/mobile/embedded)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
